LanguageData.ARA_Bodystocking_White.label: White Bodystocking
LanguageData.ARA_Bodystocking_White.description: A decorative fabric of the Arachnae Swarm, which should be useless for the swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Bodystocking_Black.label: Black Bodystocking
LanguageData.ARA_Bodystocking_Black.description: A decorative fabric of the Arachnae Swarm, which should be useless for the swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Dragoon_Uniform.label: Arachnae Dragoon Uniform
LanguageData.ARA_Dragoon_Uniform.description: An infantry uniform made from Arachnae refined carapace fabric. It provides good defense for Arachnae insectoids and also unlocks their potential near creep.
